title: Innovative LMS-Based Real-Time Online Learning Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A course strengthening language education practitioners’ competency in designing effective online classes using LMS features, acquiring optimized instructional design skills via LMS data analysis based on pandemic-era remote teaching experiences

learning_goals: Learning activity data patterns can be interpreted with 85% accuracy using LMS analytics tools
Hybrid real-time-non-face-to-face class designs can be implemented at least three times using Zoom-LMS integration features
An LMS-based formative assessment system that improves learner engagement by at least 20% can be designed

resources: Digital Content Library for Language Education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
